= Introduction =

This will show you how to update Conflict Terra using Rapid.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

=First go to the download page.=

http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/7532/screenshot012s.png

=Open the zip.=

http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/3055/screenshot013w.png

=Place files in the spring folder in program files.=

http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/4549/screenshot014f.png

=Run Rapid.bat=

http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/5640/screenshot015x.png

=If you see a progress bar in cmd you are on your way to having the latest version of Conflict Terra.=
